title: Banged-up Jonas Vingegaard Cancels Planned Race in Catalunya: Trouble for His Tour de France?
content:
Two-time yellow jersey 'not yet recovered sufficiently' after recent crash at Paris-Nice, not scheduled to race again until June. Will he be ready for his showdown Pogaƒçar?

Read the full article at Banged-up Jonas Vingegaard Cancels Planned Race in Catalunya: Trouble for His Tour de France? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
